original_text: And they sacrificed sacrifices unto the Lord, and offered burnt offerings unto the Lord, on the morrow after that day, even a thousand bullocks, a thousand rams, and a thousand lambs, with their drink offerings, and sacrifices in abundance for all Israel:
korean_text: 이튿날 여호와께 제사를 드리고 또 여호와께 번제를 드리니 수송아지가 천 마리요 숫양이 천 마리요 어린 양이 천 마리요 또 그 전제라 온 이스라엘을 위하여 풍성한 제물을 드리고

sentences.original_text: And they sacrificed sacrifices unto the Lord
and offered burnt offerings unto the Lord
on the morrow after that day
and sacrifices in abundance for all Israel:
sentences.korean_translation: 온 이스라엘을 위해 풍성한 제물을 드렸더라
